statements.statement: select * from TM_REPORT_DETAIL order by REPORT_DETAIL_ID

select RD.* from TM_REPORT AS R INNER JOIN TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION AS RS ON R.REPORT_CODE = RS.REPORT_CODE AND R.BENHVIEN_ID = RS.BENHVIEN_ID INNER JOIN TM_REPORT_DETAIL AS RD ON RD.REPORT_CODE = RS.SUB_REPORT_CODE AND RD.BENHVIEN_ID = RS.BENHVIEN_ID where R.REPORT_CODE = '$REPORT_CODE$' AND R.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select * from TM_REPORT_DETAIL
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.REPORT_DETAIL_ID = '$REPORT_DETAIL_ID$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PARAMETER_CODE = '$PARAMETER_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PARAMETER_NAME = '$PARAMETER_NAME$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.CONTROL_TYPE = '$CONTROL_TYPE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PARAMETER_INDEX = '$PARAMETER_INDEX$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.LENGTH = '$LENGTH$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE = '$DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DEFAULT_VALUE = '$DEFAULT_VALUE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.READ_ONLY = '$READ_ONLY$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_NOTNULL = '$IS_NOTNULL$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_REPORT_PARAMETER = '$IS_REPORT_PARAMETER$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_DB_PARAMETER = '$IS_DB_PARAMETER$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE = '$PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME = '$PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_DATA_GROUP = '$IS_DATA_GROUP$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DATA_GROUP = '$DATA_GROUP$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE = '$RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.RELATION_INDEX_LIST = '$RELATION_INDEX_LIST$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_1 = '$ATTRIBUTE_1$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_2 = '$ATTRIBUTE_2$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_3 = '$ATTRIBUTE_3$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_4 = '$ATTRIBUTE_4$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_5 = '$ATTRIBUTE_5$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.REPORT_CODE = '$REPORT_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION = '$DESCRIPTION$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by PARAMETER_INDEX
select * from TM_REPORT_DETAIL where TM_REPORT_DETAIL.REPORT_DETAIL_ID = '$value$' order by REPORT_DETAIL_ID
select * from TM_REPORT_DETAIL where TM_REPORT_DETAIL.REPORT_DETAIL_ID = '$REPORT_DETAIL_ID$' order by REPORT_DETAIL_ID

insert into TM_REPORT_DETAIL ( PARAMETER_CODE , PARAMETER_NAME , CONTROL_TYPE , PARAMETER_INDEX , LENGTH , DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE , DEFAULT_VALUE , READ_ONLY , IS_NOTNULL , IS_REPORT_PARAMETER , IS_DB_PARAMETER , PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE , PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME , IS_DATA_GROUP , DATA_GROUP , RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE , RELATION_INDEX_LIST , ATTRIBUTE_1 , ATTRIBUTE_2 , ATTRIBUTE_3 , ATTRIBUTE_4 , ATTRIBUTE_5 , REPORT_ID , REPORT_CODE , DESCRIPTION , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #PARAMETER_CODE# , #PARAMETER_NAME# , #CONTROL_TYPE# , #PARAMETER_INDEX# , #LENGTH# , #DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE# , #DEFAULT_VALUE# , #READ_ONLY# , #IS_NOTNULL# , #IS_REPORT_PARAMETER# , #IS_DB_PARAMETER# , #PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE# , #PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME# , #IS_DATA_GROUP# , #DATA_GROUP# , #RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE# , #RELATION_INDEX_LIST# , #ATTRIBUTE_1# , #ATTRIBUTE_2# , #ATTRIBUTE_3# , #ATTRIBUTE_4# , #ATTRIBUTE_5# , #REPORT_ID# , #REPORT_CODE# , #DESCRIPTION# , #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
statements.update: update TM_REPORT_DETAIL set PARAMETER_CODE = #PARAMETER_CODE# , PARAMETER_NAME = #PARAMETER_NAME# , CONTROL_TYPE = #CONTROL_TYPE# , PARAMETER_INDEX = #PARAMETER_INDEX# , LENGTH = #LENGTH# , DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE = #DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE# , DEFAULT_VALUE = #DEFAULT_VALUE# , READ_ONLY = #READ_ONLY# , IS_NOTNULL = #IS_NOTNULL# , IS_REPORT_PARAMETER = #IS_REPORT_PARAMETER# , IS_DB_PARAMETER = #IS_DB_PARAMETER# , PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE = #PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE# , PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME = #PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME# , IS_DATA_GROUP = #IS_DATA_GROUP# , DATA_GROUP = #DATA_GROUP# , RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE = #RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE# , RELATION_INDEX_LIST = #RELATION_INDEX_LIST# , ATTRIBUTE_1 = #ATTRIBUTE_1# , ATTRIBUTE_2 = #ATTRIBUTE_2# , ATTRIBUTE_3 = #ATTRIBUTE_3# , ATTRIBUTE_4 = #ATTRIBUTE_4# , ATTRIBUTE_5 = #ATTRIBUTE_5# , REPORT_ID = #REPORT_ID# , REPORT_CODE = #REPORT_CODE# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where REPORT_DETAIL_ID = '$REPORT_DETAIL_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TM_REPORT_DETAIL
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.REPORT_DETAIL_ID = '$REPORT_DETAIL_ID$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PARAMETER_CODE = '$PARAMETER_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PARAMETER_NAME = '$PARAMETER_NAME$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.CONTROL_TYPE = '$CONTROL_TYPE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PARAMETER_INDEX = '$PARAMETER_INDEX$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.LENGTH = '$LENGTH$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE = '$DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DEFAULT_VALUE = '$DEFAULT_VALUE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.READ_ONLY = '$READ_ONLY$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_NOTNULL = '$IS_NOTNULL$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_REPORT_PARAMETER = '$IS_REPORT_PARAMETER$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_DB_PARAMETER = '$IS_DB_PARAMETER$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE = '$PRIVATE_PARAMETER_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME = '$PRIVATE_PARAMETER_NAME$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.IS_DATA_GROUP = '$IS_DATA_GROUP$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DATA_GROUP = '$DATA_GROUP$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE = '$RELATION_PARAMETER_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.RELATION_INDEX_LIST = '$RELATION_INDEX_LIST$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_1 = '$ATTRIBUTE_1$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_2 = '$ATTRIBUTE_2$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_3 = '$ATTRIBUTE_3$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_4 = '$ATTRIBUTE_4$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.ATTRIBUTE_5 = '$ATTRIBUTE_5$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.REPORT_ID = '$REPORT_ID$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION = '$DESCRIPTION$'
TM_REPORT_DETAIL.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
